appSelectionAndLocationMerged.choseAnApplication: Chose an application and a location

validationErrors.emptyPassword: Password field can not be empty

nullOrEmptyFile.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotFoundTheFolder:
It looks like we couldn't found the folder.

For this reason, we can't show you the folders and items because that data doesn't exist!
nullOrEmptyFile.itLooksLikeThisFolderDoesNotHaveAnyFolde:
It looks like, this folder doesn't have any folder or file.
Maybe, you can try to go back!

snackBar.anErrorOccurredFmCredentialsCouldNot: An error occurred. Fm credentials could not fetch from server!
snackBar.errorHttpStatusCodeReturnedNullOnFmLogin: Error: Http status code returned null on fm login!
snackBar.errorFmCredentialsNotCorrect: Error: Fm login credentials not correct!
snackBar.errorFmAuthKeyCouldNotFetch: Error: Fm auth key could not fetch!
snackBar.errorFolderCouldNotFetchDueUnknownReason: Error: folder details couldn't load due unknown reasons.
snackBar.errorFolderCouldNotFetchDueAuthTokenErro: Error: folder details couldn't load due authentication key.
snackBar.errorDeletedOrMissingFolderCouldNotFetch: Error: folder details couldn't load due folder deleted or missing.
snackBar.errorUnauthorizedFolderCouldNotFetch: Error: folder details couldn't load due insufficient authority for this folder.
snackBar.errorFileCouldNotDownloadDueAuthKeyError: Error: File couldn't load due authentication key error!
snackBar.errorFileCouldNotDownloadDueDeletedOrMis: Error: File deleted or missing for this reason, file couldn't load.
snackBar.errorFileCouldNotDownloadDueUnknownReaso: Error: File couldn't load due unknown errors.
snackBar.weCouldNotDetectAnyAppCanOpenThisFile: We couldn't detect any app, can open this file extension!
snackBar.fileOpenerPermissionsDenied: File couldn't open due file permissions not given!

errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotFetchFileManagerCre:
It looks like we couldn't fetch file manager credentials.

You can try to fetch credentials again or if it is not working, wait a little bit and after, try it again.
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotFetchTheFileManager:
It looks like we couldn't fetch file manager cookies.

You can try to fetch cookies again or if it is not working, wait a little bit and after, try it again.
errorScreen.folderCouldNotLoadDueUnknownReasons:
Folder Couldn't Load Due
Unknown Reasons
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotLoadTheFolder: It looks like we couldn't load the folder. It can be based very large scaled errors. So try to load folder again or wait a little bit and after that, try it again.
errorScreen.folderCouldNotLoadDueAuthTokenError:
Folder Couldn't Load Due
Auth Key
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotLoadTheFolderDueAut: It looks like we couldn't load the folder due auth key error. It can be for needed re-login or can be based server error. In that reason, try to load folder again or wait a little bit and after that, try it again.
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotFoundTheFolder: It looks like we couldn't found the folder. It can be deleted or it's name can be change. In that reason, return the previous folder.
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotLoadTheFolderDueFol: It looks like we couldn't load the folder due folder permissions. If you want to see folder details, you must have the view permissions.
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotDownloadTheFileDueA:
It looks like we couldn't download the file due authentication key expiration.

We must re-login the file manager.
errorScreen.itLooksLikeWeCouldNotFoundTheFile:
It looks like we couldn't found the file. It can be deleted or it's name can be renamed.
For these reasons, refresh operation required.

commonErrors.authorizationFail: An error occurred. Fcm token is not accepted!
